Detailed Description

Class used for drawing a rubber band.

This class was created for drawing a selection box it is a very simple one. We draw a rectangle using lines despite rectangle to avoid flickering

Warning:
For the moment only positive rectangle are supported

bool wxRubberBand::VerifyRubberLines ( int  x,
int  y,
int  width,
int  height 
) [private]

[PRIVATE FUNCTION] Line verification against inverse selection rectangle

The following verification are made : x et y must not be < 0 width and height must be > 0

Returns:
TRUE if all verifications are good
